column5: Doing a fly-in to Mountairy Lake Aug 4-10th. Wondering if anyone has fished this lake. Looking for tips, bait,colors,plastics for walleyes. How about Kashabowie outposts, are they a good outfitter? How are the cabins, and equipment. So far I have heard all good things.

Kashabowie is a great bunch to go with. We have always been treated great by everyone that works for them. Camps are nice cabins are plenty big and clean. We are going with them this Aug also for the 4th time. Good luck!
